text.author: Marcie Rickenbacker
text.summary: In a letter from Ash Wednesday -- Thursday 1969, Marcie Rickenbacker write to her Mom from Abbot Academy about her grades (B, B- and C in math), her English project, her French comp., guys she is asking out to the Prom and Winter Carnival, as well as the Catholic Mass she went to with Sue and 2 other girls to get her ashes before school.
text.summary2: Marcie Rickenbacker writes a letter to her mother about her school projects and tests, as well as prom, and a Catholic Mass attended for Ash Wednesday.
text.title: Letter home, Marcie Rickenbacker, Abbot Academy, Class of 1970

Abbot NP Abbot Academy NP Academy
Andover NP Andover , , , Massachusetts NP Massachusetts 01810 CD 01810

p.rend: written with blue ink and aligned right
